alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued March 11 at 3:19PM EST until March 12 at 1:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson, Eastern Essex and Eastern Union Counties. In New York, Richmond (Staten Island) and Kings (Brooklyn) Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.1 FT, MODERATE 8.4 FT, MAJOR 9.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.9 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 11/11 PM 7.0/ 7.5 1.5/ 2.0 1.8/ 2.2 1 MINOR 12/12 PM 6.2/ 6.8 0.8/ 1.3 1.7/ 2.2 0-1 NONE 13/01 AM 6.7/ 7.2 1.2/ 1.7 1.6/ 2.0 1 NONE 13/01 PM 5.9/ 6.4 0.4/ 0.9 1.6/ 2.0 1 NONE 14/01 AM 6.6/ 7.1 1.1/ 1.6 1.4/ 1.9 1 NONE NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES -
